actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for certain gifts to employees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a business expense deduction for an award to an employee in the form of a right to choose an item of personal property from a catalogue.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the deduction for certain gifts to employees.
